description:
Show Linux Process information as captured by 
 https://github.com/ncabatoff/process-exporter  designed for PMM

panels.content: Data for $host with $interval resolution

options.content: Data for $host with $interval resolution

panels.title: Top processes by Total CPU cores used
Top processes by System CPU cores used

panels.description: Memory Used by Processes, counted as Resident Memory + Space used in Swap Space

targets.expr:
topk(5,(
(avg_over_time(namedprocess_namegroup_memory_bytes{groupname=~"$processes", memtype="swapped",server=~"$host"}[$interval])+ ignoring (memtype) avg_over_time(namedprocess_namegroup_memory_bytes{groupname=~"$processes", memtype="resident",server=~"$host"}[$interval]))
or
(avg_over_time(namedprocess_namegroup_memory_bytes{groupname=~"$processes", memtype="swapped",server=~"$host"}[5m])+ ignoring (memtype) avg_over_time(namedprocess_namegroup_memory_bytes{groupname=~"$processes", memtype="resident",server=~"$host"}[5m]))
))

panels.title: Top processes by Used  memory
Top processes by number of  processes servers
Top processes by number of threads
Top Processes by Voluntary Context Switches
Top Processes by  Non-Voluntary Context Switches
Top processes by Open File Descriptors
Top processes by File Descriptor Usage Percent
Top processes by Major Page Faults
Top processes by Minor Page Faults

targets.expr:
topk(5,(
max_over_time(namedprocess_namegroup_states{server=~"$host", groupname=~"$processes", state="Running"}[$interval]) or
max_over_time(namedprocess_namegroup_states{server=~"$host", groupname=~"$processes", state="Running"}[5m])))

topk(5,(
max_over_time(namedprocess_namegroup_states{server=~"$host", groupname=~"$processes", state="Waiting"}[$interval]) or
max_over_time(namedprocess_namegroup_states{server=~"$host", groupname=~"$processes", state="Waiting"}[5m])))

panels.title: Top of processes waiting on IO

title: System (processes)
